Desc.entry: Church of England parish church with community hall.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Disabled access to church is through the community hall

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Services at 10.30am (Holy Communion) & 6.30pm (Evensong), Mon at 7.30pm (bell-ringing), Sat 10-11.30am, (surgery for banns, baptisms, weddings etc)

Daily (WEA classes), Monday evening (Silver Spectrum Wind Band, see separate entry), Tuesday, Thursday & Friday evening (Doreen's Dancing, see separate entry), Wed am (art class, writers' group), Thurs at 1pm (Knit and Natter for all ages), 8.30-10.30pm (Sounds Forty Big Band), Fri am (dance band), Sat 10-11.30am (coffee morning)
